addService.title: Add WMS (Web Map Service) service
crsWillChange: The coordinate reference system will change
mapWillReprojectOnTheFly: The map will reproject on the fly
thereAreNoCompatibleCRS: There are no compatible coordinate reference system
baseLayerNotCompatible.instructions: Background map is not compatible with the current coordinate reference system. To continue, select one of the options below:
wmsLayerNotCompatible.instructions: The layer you want to add is not compatible with the current coordinate reference system. To continue, change the map's coordinate reference system. If there's not a compatible coordinate reference system, change the background map.
cb.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the map '{mapName}'?
cb.delete.confirm.connect.warning: You must have Internet connection to perform this operation.
cb.delete.conn.alert: You must have Internet connection to delete.
cb.delete.error: The map could not be deleted, try again.
cb.filter.plhr: Name of the map to consult
cb.mapCreation.error: The creation of the map has failed
cb.mapCreation.error.reasonAlreadyExists: The map you are trying to download exists under another name
cb.mapCreation.error.reasonIE: The creation of the map has failed. Probably it is because the size limitations imposed by Microsoft Internet Explorer and Microsoft Edge. Try to delete other offline maps that you no longer need or use another browser.
cb.mapCreation.error.reasonQuota: because there is not eough spaces in the device. Try to delete other maps or reduce the zone to download.
cb.mapCreation.error.reasonResource: due an error in the connection to the server. Try it again later
cb.mapCreation.warning.reasonCount: The creation of the map '{mapName}' may fail because the number of elements ({resourceCount}) is greater than the maximum allowed by default in your browser ({maxResourceCount}). Do you want to continue?
cb.mapCreation.warning.reasonSize: The creation of the map '{mapName}' may fail because the estimated size ({mapSize}) is larger than the available space ({availableStorage}). Do you want to continue?
cb.mapDownloading.warning: A map is being downloaded without connection. If it continues it will be lost.
cb.mapNameAlreadyExists.error: The map '{mapName}' already exists, choose another name
cb.noMapsAtSelectedExtent: No maps in the selected extension
clickOnDownloadAreaFirstCorner: Click on a corner of the area to download
clickOnDownloadAreaOppositeCorner: Press in the opposite corner of the area
clickToAddToMap: Press to add to the map
couldNotAccessLocalStorage: Could not access local storage. It is possible that you have it disabled in your browser. Note that in this case some features will not be available.
couldNotGetCapabilities: Failed to get the service capabilities document ({url})
createQrCode: Create QR code to open the map from a mobile device
createQrCodeToImage: Include QR code in the image that allows access to the map from a mobile device
deleteFeature.confirm: Do you want to remove this entity from the map?
dl.instructions.1: Place the map in the desired area and load the layers of your interest, select the desired output format and press <strong> Download </ strong>. Note that:
dl.instructions.2: It is only possible to download data from layers that are loaded and visible on the map.
dl.instructions.3: Each download can include data from several layers, which are included in a zip file <strong> zip </ strong> or <strong> kmz </ strong> by service.
dl.instructions.4: There is a limitation on the number of items to be downloaded. When this limit is exceeded, a message indicates to the user that he must reduce the number of items to be downloaded. This can be done in two ways:
dl.instructions.5: Increasing the zoom to define a smaller area.
dl.instructions.6: Reducing the number of loaded layers.
downloadLayersFromCurrentExtent: Download layers of the current extension
embedMap.tip.1: Select and press Ctrl+C to copy HTML code
embedMap.tip.2: Copy HTML from the map to the clipboard
estimatedMapSize: Estimated screen size, press to change it
featureInfo.error: The information associated with the selected point could not be obtained
featureInfo.tooManyLayers: Request too long. Remove some layers from the map.
fi.error: An error has occurred. If it persists, contact the administrator.
fileImport.error.reasonKmz: The file '{fileName}' could not be loaded because this application does not support the KMZ format. Convert the file to KML to load it
fileImport.error.reasonUnknown: The file '{fileName}' could not be loaded. Check that it has a format of the supported ones (KML, GPX, GML, GeoJSON, TopoJSON, WKT) and that it is not damaged.
fileImport.instructions: You can add the contents of KML, GML, GPX, GeoJSON, TopoJSON or WKT files from here or by dragging them to the map area.
finfo.featureChanged.warning: This geographical entity has been updated in the system after the moment it was shared. Keep in mind that some of its characteristics may have varied since then.
genericError: An error has occurred. In case the error persists, you can send an incident to the address
geo.error.out: It is currently outside the limits of the services of the IDE
geo.error.permission_denied: Geolocation not allowed, enable geolocation on the device.
geo.error.position_unavailable: Device position could not be determined.
geo.error.savelocalstorage: It is not possible to save in private browsing
geo.error.timeout: Waiting time spent during the geolocation process.
geo.error.trackinglocalstorage: There is a problem with your browser that prevents the correct operation of the tracking, please check the configuration of your browser such as private / anonymous browsing.
geo.filter.plhr: Name of the route to consult
geo.mylocation.hide.title: Hide location
geo.mylocation.show.title: View and track your location
geo.track.activate.title: Activate track
geo.track.deactivate.title: Deactivate track
geo.track.title: Track and register your location
geo.tracks.title: Tracks saved to the browser
geo.trk.deactivate.alert: The route will remain in the browser session
geo.trk.delete.alert: Do you want to delete the route?
geo.trk.edit.alert: You must indicate a new name or cancel the edition
geo.trk.page.blur: For the location tracking to work properly, the screen must be on and the application must be visible. Otherwise, it will not register new positions and save the track made until then.
geo.trk.page.blur.desktop: For the location tracking to work correctly, the tab or browser window must be visible. If not, it will not register new positions and it will keep the track made up to that moment.
geo.trk.panel.1: Keeps the tool panel open during actions associated with location tracking:
geo.trk.panel.help.1: Keep the tool panel open during follow-up
geo.trk.simulateWarning: The route has been manipulated to simulate
geo.trk.snapping.name: Name
geo.trk.upload.error: File not supported, extensions supported (GPX - KML).
geo.trk.upload.error2: An error occurred during the import.
geo.trk.upload.error4: File does not contain a valid route
joinGeometries.tooltip: Join geometries (press uppercase to select multiple entities)
layersRemove.confirm: Are you sure you want to remove all the loaded layers?
layerSrsNotCompatible: Layer SRS incompatible with the map
linkInNewWindow: The link will open in a new tab
mapStateNotValid: The map has been partially loaded. Could it be that the address is incorrect?
mobileBookmarks.instructions: Follow the instructions on the mobile device's browser to add as a favorite. The current state of the map will be saved.
noLayersFoundInService: No layers found in the indicated service
noLayersLoaded.instructions: Select some work layer to perform the download
noStreetView: No Street View near the selected point
notVisibleAtCurrentResolution: Not visible in the current resolution
noValidService.instructions: This service does not have the download enabled through WFS.
offlineMapExit.confirm: Do you want to go back to online maps?
search.instructions: Search municipality, urban area, street, address, cadastral reference, UTM coordinates or latitude-longitude
selectScreenSize: Select the size in inches of the screen
serviceAlreadyAdded: The service has already been added to the list of available layers
serviceCouldNotBeLoaded: Unable to load the indicated service
serviceSrsNotCompatible: The indicated service is not compatible with the map reference system
sharedFeatureNotValid: Impossible to restore the geografical entity
shareLink.tip.1: Select and press Ctrl + C to copy the URL
srsNotCompatible: Reference system incompatible with the map
sv.tip: StreetView: drag the figure to the desired place
threed.baseLayerNoCompatible: Background map '{name}' is not compatible with the reference system needed for 3D.
threed.baseMap.confirm: Would you prefer to load the WMTS background map of the IGN?
threed.crsNoCompatible: Select another background map. Map '{name}' is not compatible with the reference system needed for 3D.
threed.not.supported: 3D not supported by the browser. Please try another browser.
threed.rotate.drag: Turn the ring to change orientation
threed.slowSupport.supported: Your browser has lower performance than other browsers for 3D
threed.tilt.drag: Rotate the ring to change the elevation angle
threed.tilt.reset: Reset the elevation angle to the initial (50º)
title: Title
tooManyFeatures: Too many items for the service '{serviceName}'
tooManyFeatures.instructions: Zoom in on the map to select a smaller area or reduce the number of layers loaded
tooManyLayersLoaded: There are too many layers loaded in the viewer: The generated URL is too long. Try removing some layers and try again
tooManySelectedLayers.instructions: The query exceeds the limit of selected layers. Please, check your selection
wfs.noValidLayers: There is no valid downloadable layer for the {serviceTitle} service, so this service will not be consulted
wfs.GetFeatureNotAvailable: The download service (WFS) {serviceTitle} does not have the GetFeature operation enabled
wfs.IndeterminateError: An uncontrolled error has ocurred, contact the site administrator
wfs.LayersNotAvailable: The download service (WFS) of {serviceTitle} does not have the layer
wfs.QueryNotAvailable: The service (WFS) of {serviceTitle} does not have the Query operation enabled
wfs.tooManyFeatures: The maximum of {limit} elements of the service '{serviceTitle} has been exceeded
wfsGFI.noValidLayers: There is no valid downloadable layer for the {serviceTitle} service, so this service will not be consulted
wfsGFI.GetFeatureNotAvailable: The download service /WFS) {serviceTitle} does not have the GetFeature operation enabled
wfsGFI.LayersNotAvailable: The WFS query service in {serviceTitle} does not have the {layerName} layer
wfsGFI.QueryNotAvailable: The WFS query service in {serviceTitle} does not have the Query operation enabled
wfsGFI.inValidService: You can not search by line or site in the service '{serviceTitle}'
mdt.title: Digital elevation model
coords.instructions: You can change the map to one of the following compatible coordinate reference system.
coords.instructions.warning: Warning: thos marked with will be reprojected on the flight and therefore the performance will be affected.
coords.currentProjection: The current map projection is ( ).
coords.noCrs.warning: The current background map and/or the loaded layers do not have compatible reference systems anymore.
deleteAll.confirm: Do you want to erase everything that is drawn?
noLayersLoaded.loadLayer: To load a layer select an available layer from the layer tree below
